meanings.definition: A person who does too much or goes to extremes in their actions or behavior.
meanings.sent1: Some overdoers exhaust themselves by trying to do everything at once.
meanings.sent2: The group of overdoers in the office always take on more tasks than they can handle.
meanings.sent3: The overdoers at the party were the first ones on the dance floor and the last ones to leave.
meanings.sent4: In the world of gardening, the overdoers are the ones with perfectly manicured lawns and elaborate flower arrangements.
meanings.sent5: The overdoers in the gym push themselves to the limit every day to achieve their fitness goals.
